articles.description: Harry Maguire has revealed that he had 'no regrets' about the clash with police in Mykonos in the summer of 2020. The £190,000-a-week defender was hoping to be cleared on appeal.
articles.content:
Harry Maguire has re-visited the agony of his arrest and conviction for assaulting a police officer, on the eve of leaving with the England team seeking World Cup glory.
The Manchester United defend… [+3518 chars]
